function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of increased infection in houses with several occupants","Impact":"Higher risk of infection due to close contact","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures within the household, use face masks, and practice proper hygiene","Technologies":"Smartphone apps for contact tracing, remote work technologies, and telemedicine services","People":"Occupants of houses with several occupants","Owner":"Household members, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Reliance on internet-based technologies for data collection","Impact":"Potential bias in the data collected due to limited access to technology","Mitigation":"Use a combination of online and offline data collection methods to ensure representation from diverse demographics","Technologies":"Internet-based survey platforms, paper-based surveys, phone interviews","People":"Survey participants with limited access to technology","Owner":"Research organizations, survey administrators"},{"Description":"Visiting UGSs close to homes with family or friends","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among visitors","Mitigation":"Limit the number of visitors, maintain social distancing, wear masks, and practice proper hygiene","Technologies":"Smartphone apps for monitoring visitor density, online booking systems for visitation slots","People":"Visitors to UGSs","Owner":"Local authorities, UGS management organizations"}]}
